description: From Middle English dotacion, from Late Latin dotatio, from Latin dotare (“to endow”).

entries.meaning: The act of endowing, or bestowing a marriage portion on a woman.
Endowment; establishment of funds for support, as of a hospital or eleemosynary corporation.
examples: As to eleemosynary corporations, by the dotation the founder and his heirs are of common right the legal visitors  […]
